def OnCMD_IMPRIMIRExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode
# recupera a lista que representa o breadcrumb breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("AT_ITEMMOVIMENTACAOREQUISICOES"))
command.TransitoryVars["HANDLEREQUISICAO"] = item.Handle
